title: ennai kAttaruLvadu
sahitya:
ennai kAttaruLvad-oru bhAramA aDimai
 en pAzhvinaik-kunnai edirkkum dhIramA ammA


anupallavi

  annai unakku shatakOTi maghavundu agadi Ezhai adil en pOl unDO


caraNam    bhaktha kOTigaLai pAdu kAkkum para dEvatai nIyanrO unakkum
bhAra pakSam Ora vanjanaiyum unDO nAn en sheivEn
bhukthi mukti sakala bhOga bhAgyamum parindaruLum bhuvanEshvari
bhUmagaL nAmagaL paNi mayilaapuri karpakamE eLiya rAmadAsan
